DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether omega-3 fatty acid supplementation effective prevention progressive cognitive decline elderly people age 75 year old .
DOC.brief_title: Dietary Supplement Prevention Cognitive Decline Very Elderly Population .
DOC.detailed_description: Participants resident three nurse home Pamplona ( Spain ) . We assume 20 % elderly people cognitive decline estimate 5 % cognitive decline intervention group . Sample size estimate 85 participant arm , assume two group alpha 0.05 , 80 % power accounting 10 % participant lose follow-up . Repeated measure ANOVA , Cox regression multiple linear regression analysis use statistical analysis data .
DOC.criteria: Elderly people age 75 year old Global Deterioration Scale < 4 Capacity complete test Neurological , physical psychiatry condition , obtain medical history , may influence cognitive function . Dementia History epilepsy , convulsion
